amendment.description: To ensure government performance of critical acquisition functions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4353 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4353 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6120) To ensure government performance of critical acquisition functions.
